note:
Online since the Great Renaming of Usenet. I think I have gotten wiser and dumber and less willing to roll over to asshats with time.
Late in moving to a well run instance, here and at oulipo now. I am human with cats and cohabitants, and write as my brainstorms decide.
Techie turned government worker. Justice please. All Cats Are Beautiful.
ND queer person who tries to understand and support all demographics underserved by existing systems.
Listen; learn; be safe; be kind.

fields.name: Cats
fields.value: Spike (profile photo is littermate Vash, fuck cancer), Greg
